clinicalHistory.guidelineTitle: Laboratory Evidence of Immunity or confirmation of Hepatitis A disease

contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.

contraindication.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Hepatitis A
contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Hepatitis A vaccine.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to neomycin.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to alum.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to yeast.
